summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers", likely concerning the automated extraction of data from websites. It instructs these scrapers to adhere to robots.txt rules and acknowledges rate limiting based on IP address. It also suggests using the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service for data access. The bill appears to address issues related to online data access and potential misuse, hinting at a broader scope concerning data privacy or content management online.
